title: Propelry - Real Estate Platform
subtitle: Modern real estate platform for property listings and management
description: A comprehensive real estate platform that connects property buyers, sellers, and agents. Built with modern web technologies for seamless user experience.

content.overview: Propelry is a cutting-edge real estate platform designed to revolutionize how people buy, sell, and manage properties. The platform offers advanced search capabilities, virtual tours, and seamless communication between buyers and sellers.
content.challenge: The real estate market needed a modern, user-friendly platform that could handle large volumes of property listings while providing an intuitive experience for both buyers and sellers. The challenge was to create a scalable solution that could integrate with multiple data sources and provide real-time updates.
content.solution: We built a full-stack application using Next.js for optimal performance and SEO. The platform features advanced filtering, interactive maps, virtual property tours, and a robust admin dashboard for property management.

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content:
• Advanced Property Search with AI-powered recommendations
• Interactive Map Integration with Google Maps
• Virtual 3D Property Tours
• Real-time Messaging between Buyers and Sellers
• Comprehensive Admin Dashboard
• Mobile-responsive Design
• Secure Payment Gateway Integration

sections.title: Platform Dashboard
sections.caption: The comprehensive admin dashboard for managing properties

sections.title: Sample API Endpoint
Project Highlights
items: Successfully launched with 500+ property listings in the first month
Reduced property search time by 70% with AI-powered recommendations
Integrated with multiple MLS (Multiple Listing Services) data sources
Implemented advanced security features including 2FA and encryption

content.results: The platform successfully launched and gained significant traction with over 500 active listings in the first month. User engagement increased by 150% compared to traditional real estate platforms, and the average time to close a deal decreased by 40%.

testimonial.text: NJ Tech Studio delivered an exceptional platform that transformed our real estate business. The attention to detail and technical expertise was outstanding.
testimonial.author: John Smith

title: E-Commerce Analytics Dashboard
subtitle: Real-time analytics and insights for online stores
description: A powerful analytics dashboard that provides real-time insights into e-commerce performance, customer behavior, and sales trends.

content.overview: An advanced analytics dashboard built for e-commerce businesses to track sales, monitor customer behavior, and gain actionable insights. The platform processes millions of data points to provide real-time visualizations and predictive analytics.
content.challenge: E-commerce businesses struggled with fragmented data across multiple platforms. They needed a unified dashboard that could aggregate data from various sources and present it in an easily digestible format while handling large volumes of real-time data.
content.solution: We developed a highly responsive dashboard using React and TypeScript with Firebase for real-time data synchronization. The solution includes custom-built charts, predictive analytics using machine learning, and automated reporting features.

sections.title: Platform Capabilities
sections.content: The dashboard provides comprehensive analytics including sales trends, customer segmentation, inventory management, and revenue forecasting. It integrates seamlessly with major e-commerce platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, and Magento.

sections.title: Analytics Overview
sections.caption: Real-time analytics with interactive charts and visualizations

sections.title: Real-time Data Hook
Technical Achievements
items: Processed over 10 million data points daily with sub-second latency
Implemented WebSocket connections for real-time updates
Built custom chart components for better performance
Integrated machine learning models for sales forecasting
Reduced page load time to under 2 seconds

sections.title: Performance Optimization
sections.content: We implemented advanced caching strategies and data aggregation techniques to ensure the dashboard remains responsive even with millions of data points. The use of Redis for caching and WebSockets for real-time updates significantly improved performance.

content.results: The dashboard helped clients increase their revenue by 35% through better insights and data-driven decisions. Customer satisfaction scores improved by 45%, and the average time spent on data analysis decreased from 4 hours to 30 minutes per day.

testimonial.text: This dashboard completely transformed how we understand our business. The insights we gained led to a 35% increase in revenue within the first quarter.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
